definition: Nanjing St., large commercial street in Shanghai
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)

sentences.english: Nanjing Road and Huaihai Road are always crowded with people.
sentences.chinese: 南京路和淮海路都擠滿了人。

sentences.english: We have move to our new office located at No. 140 nankeen road.
sentences.chinese: 我門的心辦公室遷至南京路140號。

sentences.english: A:Pardon me ,can you tell me how to get to Nanjing Road?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，能不能告訴我怎樣去南京路？

sentences.english: In Shanghai, people were evacuated from office buildings inHongqiao and Nanjing Road.
sentences.chinese: 在上海，人們從虹橋路和南京路的辦公室撤離。

sentences.english: A quick walk along Nanjing Road will remind you of many similar names .
sentences.chinese: 快速沿南京路將提醒您的良多相似的名稱。

sentences.english: I'd suggest they go to Nanjing Road.
You will be taken to visit Nanjing Road, the down-town area.
sentences.chinese: 就會帶你們去南京路，那是上海的商業中心。

sentences.english: They strolled away together along Nanjing Road.
sentences.chinese: 他們一道沿着南京路遛去。

sentences.english: In Shanghai, people were evacuated from office buildings in Hongqiao and Nanjing Road.
sentences.chinese: 在上海，人們從虹橋路和南京路的辦公室撤離。

sentences.english: Busy sight-seeing cars in Pedestrian street of Nanjing Road.
sentences.chinese: 南京路步行街上的觀光車十分繁忙。

sentences.english: Come down Nanjing road about five blocks.
sentences.chinese: 由南京路街往下走約五個街道。

sentences.english: How long is it go get to Nanjing Road now?
sentences.chinese: 距離南京路站還有多長時間？

definition: Zhongshan Park, the name of numerous parks in China, honoring Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]
Hankou, part of Wuhan 武漢|武汉 at the junction of Han river and Changjiang in Hubei
Tanggu former district of Tianjin, now part of Binhai subprovincial district 濱海新區|滨海新区[Bin1 hai3 xin1 qu1]
Xujiahui, an area in 徐匯區|徐汇区[Xu2 hui4 qu1], Xuhui district, central Shanghai
Wujiaochang neighborhood of Shanghai, adjacent to Fudan University
Laocheng district of Luoyang City 洛陽市|洛阳市[Luo4 yang2 shi4], Henan
